snippet.title: Super Mario Kart Horizons - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Release Trailer for Super Mario Kart - Horizons. Read Description for more info!
---------------------------------------------------------------------
🌆 Super Mario Kart Horizons Features 🌇
---------------------------------------------------------------------
★24 new custom tracks:
    ☆ 20 Race tracks
    ☆ 4 Battle Mode Arenas
★ 8 New track themes:
    ☆ Alpine Pass, Sparkle Oasis, Frigid Mine, Jungle Ruins
    ☆ Evening Isles, Sunrise Ridge, Rice Terra, Revamped Rainbow Road
★ Brand new custom music:
    ☆ Title Screen, Menu, Podium, Credits
    ☆ All 8 themes main themes
    ☆ Battle Mode theme
    ☆ Character victory tune
    ☆ Misc. tunes (4th place, lose, win jingle, etc.)
★ Unlock new content:
    ☆ Mirror Mode is available for all cups and in time trial.
    ☆ Extra Difficulty when selecting a cup in any CC.
★ Custom Sprites:    
    ☆ Main Characters    
    ☆ Obstacles
    ☆ Items
    ☆ Many more... (Cup icons, etc.)
★ Modified Screens
    ☆ Title Screen, Driver Select, Cup Selection
    ☆ Award Ceremony, Credits, Results
★ New Title Screen Demos
★ Reworked Ranking & qualifying system
★ Works on original hardware!
★ Extra Assets available for download:
    ☆ Official release of the original soundtrack: https://nsmbhd.net/file/jD1Jz0vNkep7REE2/Super%20Mario%20Kart%20Horizons%20-%20Original%20Soundtrack.zip
    ☆ Hack Instruction Booklet: https://nsmbhd.net/file/MPdYVjyywGD8bPNz/Super%20Mario%20Kart%20Horizons%20-%20Instructions%20Booklet.pdf
    ☆ Game Box, Cart Label & Logo: https://nsmbhd.net/file/jUu1SuLnxZDbYvRy/Super%20Mario%20Kart%20Horizons%20-%20Boxes,%20Labels%20&%20Logo.zip

---------------------------
🎮 Download 🎮
---------------------------
https://romhacks.org/romhacks/super-mario-kart-horizons-snes/
Be sure to read the README for instructions & more!

----------------------
🗒️ Credits🗒️
----------------------
Gridatttack - Main hack creator & director. Custom tracks & graphics.
DJGrisner - Custom Soundtrack & custom graphics.
Cocatriz - Main tester.

Laurie - Main artwork for the hack
https://laurie.ink/projects/XgEoey
Emilio - Artworks for the Soundtrack Albums
@ttower111

Music used in trailer:
The Winner by Njomo-zu Z
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6gI7moPiwCk
